org.apache.flink.client

类 LocalExecutor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.api.common.PlanExecutor
      • org.apache.flink.client.LocalExecutor

  • public class LocalExecutor
extends PlanExecutor
    A PlanExecutor that runs Flink programs on a local embedded Flink runtime instance.

    By simply calling the executePlan(org.apache.flink.api.common.Plan) method, this executor still start up and shut down again immediately after the program finished.

    To use this executor to execute many dataflow programs that constitute one job together, then this executor needs to be explicitly started, to keep running across several executions.

      • start

        public void start()
           throws java.lang.Exception
        从类复制的说明: PlanExecutor
        Starts the program executor. After the executor has been started, it will keep running until PlanExecutor.stop() is called.
        指定者:
        start 在类中 PlanExecutor
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown, if the executor startup failed.

      • stop

        public void stop()
          throws java.lang.Exception
        从类复制的说明: PlanExecutor
        Shuts down the plan executor and releases all local resources.

        This method also ends all sessions created by this executor. Remote job executions may complete, but the session is not kept alive after that.

        指定者:
        stop 在类中 PlanExecutor
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown, if the proper shutdown failed.

      • isRunning

        public boolean isRunning()
        从类复制的说明: PlanExecutor
        Checks if this executor is currently running.
        指定者:
        isRunning 在类中 PlanExecutor
        返回:
        True is the executor is running, false otherwise.

      • executePlan

        public JobExecutionResult executePlan(Plan plan)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Executes the given program on a local runtime and waits for the job to finish.

        If the executor has not been started before, this starts the executor and shuts it down after the job finished. If the job runs in session mode, the executor is kept alive until no more references to the executor exist.

        指定者:
        executePlan 在类中 PlanExecutor
        参数:
        plan - The plan of the program to execute.
        返回:
        The net runtime of the program, in milliseconds.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown, if either the startup of the local execution context, or the execution caused an exception.

      • getOptimizerPlanAsJSON

        public java.lang.String getOptimizerPlanAsJSON(Plan plan)
                                        throws java.lang.Exception
        Creates a JSON representation of the given dataflow's execution plan.
        指定者:
        getOptimizerPlanAsJSON 在类中 PlanExecutor
        参数:
        plan - The dataflow plan.
        返回:
        The dataflow's execution plan, as a JSON string.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown, if the optimization process that creates the execution plan failed.

      • endSession

        public void endSession(JobID jobID)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        从类复制的说明: PlanExecutor
        Ends the job session, identified by the given JobID. Jobs can be kept around as sessions, if a session timeout is specified. Keeping Jobs as sessions allows users to incrementally add new operations to their dataflow, that refer to previous intermediate results of the dataflow.
        指定者:
        endSession 在类中 PlanExecutor
        参数:
        jobID - The JobID identifying the job session.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Thrown, if the message to finish the session cannot be delivered.
